title: S1 Ep53: Slippery fish
itunes:title: Slippery fish
description: When the government in Chile attempts to limit which fish can be caught and sold to protect stocks, market traders always find a way around the restrictions. Ahmed Mushfiq Mobarak tells Tim Phillips the story of an experiment in how to enforce regulation -- with a surprise finding that could change how compliance works in other industries too.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
